name: RiNGminder(tm) MkII Password/Crypto Rings
description:
Taking durability and style to the next level, these 2nd-gen password recall rings are made from high-quality stainless steel, with symbols engraved to 0.2mm for extra scratch resistance and toughness.

They also feature a new random 1-2 dot column which can be used in your password or code scheme to make enigma-style shifts for extra security.

Purchase a matched pair so you can have fun exchanging secret messages with another person, or a non-matched pair to use purely for password generation, as with the original RiNGminder(tm).

name: RiNGminder(tm) password generator/recall rings
description:
User Manual: Download PDF

You can't forget what you never had to remember!

The RiNGminder™ was inspired by my wife, whose email account was hacked, not once, but twice in a six-month period. Then her friend's email was also hacked a week later. The problem was they both used simple passwords, and used the same one for every web account.

I thought, there has to be a better way to make secure passwords that anyone can use.

I'm a computer guy, and I know how hard it is to manage all the passwords in one's daily life now. So I thunk and I thunk until my thinker was sore: how can people make better, more secure passwords, and how can they possibly remember all those secure passwords for all their different devices and website accounts? Then I realized the solution is not to remember passwords at all.

What was needed was a decidely low-tech solution. So here it is, the RiNGminder™! A simple, no-batteries-required, always on-hand (literally!) solution to making hard to guess -- but easy to recall -- passwords,  for all your online web accounts and personal electronic devices. They're also fun and fashionable accessories for your fingers! They are shiny and make you look like a super-spy. I twirl mine a lot during meetings or while waiting in line for groceries :)
